Portal 1 is one of the best games ever made. This is just more portal. Can't go wrong. The portal collection is a must have.
Ã‰ bÃ£o

Incredible game. Truly one of the best games on steam. GlaDOS and Wheatley are absolutely hilarious. Choosing which is better is a tough assignment. And the puzzles are really well done too. I had a tough time picturing how they would innovate on the previous game, and they succeeded. The only part of the game I didn't like was chapter 6 and 7. Without saying any spoilers, they were in very large, open rooms, and a lot of the difficulty I had was finding a hidden small segment of wall to portal to. The puzzles in those two chapters were a bit weird, although the new puzzle mechanic in those chapters was awesome. Those two chapters also contain a lot of lore, but the plot for those chapters was a bit hard to follow. 

Anyway awesome game, one of the best on steam. Buy it! Wait for a sale if you're unsure.

Edit: just finished the game. I'd give it a 9 out of 10. The game dragged on a bit long imo. But seriously, two of the funniest characters ever, the puzzles were mostly great, and the ending is amazing. I can't wait to play coop.

Even better than the 1st, which was a hard act to follow.
Why is there no Portal 3 in the works?

This is one of my favourite games. I'm not really sure why, but everything about it just seems so amazing. The soundtrack is brilliant, the gameplay is fun, I really enjoyed the story, and something about the environments all the way throughout the game just feels amazing. I don't know how to describe it, I don't feel I'm doing the game justice, but it's just great.
